item.description:
***Professional Singles Night with Central CT Singles Thursday July 23 at 7pm***

Are you a Professional Single? Do you want to meet other Professional Singles?

Don’t settle for less – meet that high quality educated professional and find your perfect match!

Put on your good tie or dress and join Central CT Singles and Local Single Professions for Magic Table.

The Magic Table Lets You MEET and TALK With ALL The
Other Singles At This Event, And Then The Magic Begins


Feel the spark and chemistry of finally meeting and connecting with someone who is a great match with you – who shares common interests and backgrounds.

Unlike Speed Dating, there is no pressure, no stress, and no boredom. We show you to your table, introduce you to other singles, start the conversation – and then you take it from there!

Professional dress is required - No jeans, t-shirts, or sneakers DRESS TO IMPRESS

Space Is Limited To 60 people -30 Men and 30 Women
-So Reserve Your Spot Today!


NEXT EVENT: July 23 at 7 pm at:

Sakura Garden Japanese Steak House
Eric Town Square
120 Hebron Ave
Glastonbury, CT 06033
(860) 236-3343

Take Exit 8 off Route 2

Look for the Central CT Singles Signs, Sakura is located in Eric Town Square Plaza - between Sauce and Plan B - Across the street from The Gallery

Enjoy Appetizers, Full Bar, and the Magic Table
For $15 Online, $ 20 At The Event

SUMMER SPECIAL – Only $10 Online or $15 At The Event


Professional Singles Night with Magic Table is a great alternative to Internet dating, speed dating, singles dances, or hanging out at the bar hoping to meet the right person. With Central CT Single’s Magic Table, you are guaranteed to have a great time while you meet new people.

Reserve your spot today! Visit http://www.CentralCTS... or call (860) 236-3343
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Central CT Singles Signs

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: Professional Singles Night with Central CT Singles
